titles.title: Ovarian Cancer Research and Information Amendments of 1995
To amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for programs regarding ovarian cancer.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

bill.summary: 5/25/1995--Introduced. Ovarian Cancer Research and Information Amendments of 1995 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize appropriations for research on ovarian cancer. Specifies information to be included in information and education programs relating to ovarian cancer.
